lead_paragraph: A big round purple bruise on his right shoulder, U.S. swimmer Michael Phelps emerged from the pool in his qualifying heat for the 200-metre butterfly on Monday feeling the aches and the toll of late-night races in his fifth Olympics.

headline.main: Phelps Feels Pain of Aging and Late-Night Races
headline.print_headline: Phelps Feels Pain of Aging and Late-Night Races
